mapper.select: select a.name, a.img, nvl(l.fcnt, 0) fan_cnt from artist a left OUTER join (select artist, count(*) as fcnt from like_artist_list group by artist) l on a.name = l.artist where a.name = #{artist}

select s.song_album, s.song_title, s.song_id, nvl(l.cnt, 0) song_cnt from song s left OUTER join (select song_id, count(*) as cnt from like_it_list group by song_id) l on s.song_id = l.song_id where s.song_artist= #{artist}
